rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for the Mistwinds enters, look at the top five cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}, {T}: Mill two cards, then draw a card. If your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
